Name: Puppy Doge VR
About the game: Puppy Doge VR offers a light VR experience where players casually interact with a puppy. features: choose from 3 different puppies pet puppies by stroking their fur feed or play fetch Optional 'Doge Mode' inspired by internet meme Disclaimer: this basic simulation DOES NOT feature mechanics such as growth or obedience training. This is not a full blown pet game.
